extendedInfo.description: This is the OFFICIAL application of Penn State Athletics created by the CBSSports.com College Network, in partnership with the University. This exclusive sports application offers LIVE STREAMED games:************************************************************LIVE AUDIO*- Upgrade in the application to stream select games************************************************************* Audio is only available on certain compatible Android devices running OS2.2 or later. In order to access the audio please install the Sports Media Player in Google Play and re-launch this application.Annual Subscription $4.99ADDITIONAL APPLICATION FEATURES-	Live Scoring-	Play-by-Play-	Complete Sport Schedules-	Exclusive breaking sports news-	Alerts (game start and final scores)-	Team and Coaches Rosters & Bios-	 Much moreâ¦COVERS ALL SCHOOL SPORTS!

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: This app is awful. Attempting to stream the game yesterday, the studio volume was so low it was unlistenable via headphones, phone speaker or bluetooth speaker. \302\240Not worth the $5. \302\240Additionally, can\'t stream a game and also do ANYTHING else. If you truly to a text, check and email, even turn of the screen to conserve battery, the app exits thereby stopping the streaming game.
reviews.author: Mark Wilson

reviews.title: Please improve!
reviews.comment: Sound quality on radio feed is poor, I had to turn volume up all the way to be able to hear it at all.  I could not leave app to do anything else while game was streaming or else the app would shut down.  Come on CBS, we expect a higher quality product from you!  Not worth $4.99 as it is currently formatted.
reviews.author: Dave Meloni

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I love this app!!
reviews.author: Rico Smooth

reviews.title: It\'s okay!!!
reviews.comment: Please update scores a little faster but other than that...I love this app!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Standings?
reviews.comment: App seems good, easy to use and full of info. However, i cant seem to find the standings for any sport. I feel that is an obvious miss from the developers of this app. Add that in and i would give this app 5 stars
reviews.author: Justin Ingersoll

reviews.title: Good App, bad business
reviews.comment: The app itself is good and works well, organized well but could be updated quicker.  I\'m really disappointed that when you already subscribe to Penn State All-Access ($80/year) from CBS Sports you can\'t log in to get access on the phone as well, instead you need to do an in-app purchase.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app easy way to follow all the sports while ur on the go
